mapper.insert: insert into t_flag (fid, hname, typeid, hdate, implement, word, userid, click) values (#{fid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{hname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{typeid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{hdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{implement,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{word,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{click,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update t_flag set hname = #{hname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, typeid = #{typeid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, hdate = #{hdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, implement = #{implement,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, word = #{word,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, userid = #{userid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, click = #{click,jdbcType=INTEGER} where fid = #{fid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select fid, hname, typeid, hdate, implement, word, userid, click from t_flag
